item.title: Parallel Processing to Reduce Processing Time
item.author: Author
item.description: Parallel processing can be used to significantly decrease the compute time of large data sets. This post discusses about parallel processing along with implementation and examples.

item.title: Log Routing in ECS Fargate Tasks
item.author: Author
item.description: This article delves into detailed procedure of sending different logs from AWS ECS Fargate containers to different destinations using AWSFirelens container as side car.

item.title: Website Monitoring
item.author: Author
item.description: Monitoring website and notifying the site admin about downtime using cron job.

item.title: Tracking Failed ECS Tasks
item.author: Author
item.description: Tracking Amazon ECS task failures using Amazon EventBridge which can make it easier for Root Cause Analysis.
